attributes.additional_details:
With the recent lawless behaviour of the nations youth (led by adults or not) in mind we believe that compulsory national service (between 6 months and 2 years) for males and females should be made compulsory.
    This does not necessarily mean the army but rather a place where discipline and a common goal can be achieved and a service to the community provided, providing stability and a sense of community in the lives of every boy and girl.
